body_html:
I would also like to be able to use namedtuple for dataset examples. This would require changes to DataLoader as identified above, and also to DataParallel. I don't know if there are other places we need to be careful (maybe DistributedDataParallel?)

I don't know if we want to support a batch_type_ctor argument, but at least handling namedtuple correctly seems like a good start.

Does anyone see any blockers? It's probably quite easy to implement.

I don't know if we want to support a batch_type_ctor argument, but at least handling namedtuple correctly seems like a good start.
Does anyone see any blockers? It's probably quite easy to implement.
body:
I would also like to be able to use `namedtuple` for dataset examples. This would require changes to `DataLoader` as identified above, and also to `DataParallel`. I don't know if there are other places we need to be careful (maybe `DistributedDataParallel`?)

I don't know if we want to support a `batch_type_ctor` argument, but at least handling `namedtuple` correctly seems like a good start.

Does anyone see any blockers? It's probably quite easy to implement.
